body: I hatr thr fact that the guy cant take both of them out, and that this is thr latest of thr series and its already completed, erika isnt a bad choice but id prefer maho ngl. Like the graphics probably is gonna get enhanced by the tl team and i would very much pay if they do it sooner
i hope there's uncensored for those 3 volume
BROOOOOOOOOOOO THIS IS FUCKING LIT! Holy shit I did not expect this to be that fucking good!
To the commenter before me, thank you!

(Continued) Turns out it was Maho's keikaku. She feeds everyone with aphrosidiac-food + get them drunk -> coerced-ish threesome (Erika also has a crush on Maho) -> blissed!Erika has an epiphany/memory of when she and Maho met, about Maho'd effed-upness being over her fear of losing her friends and family (her sister Maho, her friend Erika and even the guy) to others. 

Morning after, they left the inn, Erika and the guy is back in love together. Maho concedes her final, complete defeat as they all walked into the sunset.

Epilogue: Erika and guy's happy family.
Meanwhile Maho's with child (implied to be from her affair with the guy) and she is content.

Sum up:

Oorai's First Championship Finale: Erika lost, and is bitter about it, while her captain's got her sweet family reunion -> go off to cry alone behind her tank. Meets tank mechanic guy/Boys und Flugzeugge/implied to be Maho's childhood sweetheart, who comforted Erika, falls in love, is pregnant (Volume 1)

Erika doesn't deal with pregnancy moodswing well + him being an idiot young dad + culture clash between her Germanic hyper-industriousness and his easygoing, so she picks up her child and left for a while. Maho meanwhiles is being forced by her mother to have an arranged marriage, so she left home -> reunion with the guy -> desire to not be forced into arrange marriage + messed up upbringing makes her wants to be loved -> affair.

Erika returns, learn that Maho ran away, find them -> Erika and guy gets scolded by Maho's mom over 'proper family tradition' (effing *lol*) -> left Erika's child with Miho and the mom who turns out to not be a complete ****head -> (tbc)

So in vol2 she actually left him to delay the inevitable. That she and him is gonna go back to Germany. She knows maho also loves him. Also if I interpret the last page correctly the reason they returned to Germany has been accomplished so it's implied that they will return to maho ( That's maho and his baby sleeping with maho)
This can be a legit manga by itself like what the heck!?
